Package ui.graphical

Defines a Graphical User Interface for the game (using AWT and Swing).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ROOT
    Graphical - ROOT
    Defines a path relative to the jar to find the images.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cell
    Graphical - Cell
    Encapsulates the creation of the hexagonal terrains of the map.
    EditorFrame
    Graphical - Editor Frame
    Creates a general editor to the user, allowing it to write his own programs for the robots.
    Graphical
    UI - Graphical Mode
    Makes an implementation of the interface UI for exhibiting the game, using Java's default graphic libraries (AWT and Swing).
    MapFrame
    Graphical - Map Frame
    Creates a panel with the main components of the game, as the complete arena and a log-messenger with all robots' info.
    Menu
    MENU - Graphical Mode
    Makes an implementation of the interface MENU for exhibiting the game, using Java's default graphic libraries (AWT and Swing).
    MenuPanel
    MENU - Menu Panel
    Panel with the menu screen and the buttons with its properties.
    MiniMapFrame
    Graphical - MiniMap Frame
    Provides a small screen with the user's view of all terrains.
    Panel
    Graphical - Panel
    Creates the main panel to exhibit the map.
    Swing
    Swing Initialize global setting related to the GUI Swing.
    UserInterface
    Graphical - User Interface
    Creates a menu bar in the game to be like a user interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Images
    Graphical - Images
    Set up the paths for all images used in the graphical user interface, allowing to load the buffered image from the enum value.
    Panel.Level
    Panel - Level Auxiliar enum for the levels in which the elements will be displayed inside the Panel.
    Phase
    Graphical - Phase
    Auxiliar enumeration to point in which phase the game is, painting messages to the user accordingly to this phases.
    Type
    Graphical - Type
    Defines which type of image we are dealing with

Package ui.graphical Description

Defines a Graphical User Interface for the game (using AWT and Swing).
